name: @homebus/broker
description: A simple bus implementation for M2M. Not intended to be the fastest but to implement a set of features and be simple to use and setup.
author: Mattias Runge-Broberg <mattias@runge.se>

scripts.service_file: sed 's/$USER/'"$USER"'/g' homebus.service | sed 's@$PWD@'"$PWD"'@g' | sed 's@$NODE@'"$(which node)"'@g' | sudo tee /lib/systemd/system/homebus.service
scripts.service: yarn service_file && sudo systemctl daemon-reload && sudo systemctl enable homebus
